request.description: Implement Dynamic Metrics for Analytics Personal Records. Make Performance Analytics → Personal Records display training-type-appropriate metrics instead of hardcoded weight/reps. PHASES: (1) Add PersonalRecord TypeScript interface with all metric fields, (2) Rewrite getPersonalRecords backend query to lookup exercise→category→trainingType and track all metrics (distance, velocity, contacts, duration, HR, power), (3) Update PerformanceAnalytics.tsx frontend with formatPRDisplay() switch by trainingTypeSlug, (4) Test with Playwright across strength/speed/plyometric/conditioning exercises. Reference: Serena memory PLAN_ANALYTICS_DYNAMIC_METRICS_FIX_20251207
